title: 大部分插件配置文件汉化分享[汉化11+插件][10.1更新]
txt_content: 本帖最后由 104417372 于 2014-11-23 20:32 编辑 最近发现很多人都母鸡怎么搞汉化撒，我就来当雷锋（！莫说我水）明天开始发布汉化文件文件发出会@作者 有些是小小的自己汉化的文件（也会@作者） 你也可以在评论下方提问：需要什么汉化的（实在不行的，那就算了）你也可以自己发布汉化在这里，我会把汉化发到这里＜＜，并送人气+金粒20个（不多哈） （注明：你如果觉得我是闲着无聊，人家作者都汉化过了，还发这个帖子，这不是无聊么，其实你可以换一个角度看，主要就是帮小白辅助） 明天更新插件汉化、如下：（9个）+X个 iConomy（Template.yml文件夹汉化）（汉化100%）非本人 # # Messaging Template tag:   money: '[游戏币信息] ' personal:   balance: 游戏币数量： +balance   reset: 你的账户已被重置.   set: 你的资金被设置为+amount   debit: 你的资金被扣除+amount.   credit: +amount 已打入你的账户   status: 账户当前状态： +status. player:   set: +name的资金被设置为 +amount   balance: +name的资金： +balance   reset: +name的账户被重置   credit: +name的账户收到+amount.   debit: +name的账户被扣除+amount.   status: +name的账户当前状态： +status. payment:   self: 你不能给自己打钱   to: 你发送+amount 给 +name.   from: +name发给你+amount. statistics:   opening: -----[ iConomy 状态 ]-----   total: 总值 +currency： +amount   average: 平均 +currency： +amount   accounts: 全部账户： +amount interest:   announcement: 获得利息 +amount . accounts:   empty: 已清空 所有 账户   purge: 所有冻结账户已被清空   create: 创建账户： +name.   remove: 移除账户： +name.   status: 账户当前状态： +status. top:   opening: -----[ Wealthiest Accounts ]-----   item: +i. +name - +amount error:   online: 没有其他人在线   exists: 账户已存在   create: 不能创建账户： +name.   remove: 不能移除账户： +name.   account: 账户 +name 不存在   funds: 你没有足够的钱那样做!复制代码RandomPlacer（非本人汉化！）（修改config文件夹随机传送提示） RandomPlacer:复制代码 AutoSaveworld（configmsg里面的保存文字提示汉化）（一部分）80% broadcast:   pre: '&9系统保存地图中'   post: '&9地图保存完毕' broadcastbackup:   pre: '&9自动备存中'   post: '&9自动备存完毕' broadcastpurge:   pre: '&9AutoPurging'   post: '&9AutoPurge Complete' warning:   save: '&9Warning, AutoSave will commence soon.'   backup: '&9Warning, AutoBackup will commence soon' insufficentpermissions: '&cYou do not have access to that command.' autorestart:   restarting: '&9服务器重启中'   countdown: '&9服务器会在{SECONDS}秒后重启'复制代码 residence（config进出提示） # Whether or not the player can change the Residence enter and leave messages.            CanChange: true            # The default enter message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group.            # Leaving the message blank will disable it.            DefaultEnter: 欢迎 %player 来到 %residence, 所有者是 %owner.            # The default leave message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group.            # Leaving the message blank will disable it.            DefaultLeave: 你离开了 %residence.复制代码 Clearlagg（修改config清理提示）玩家可自改提示 #--------------------------------------------------------------------# #                   ClearLag Configuration File                      # #--------------------------------------------------------------------# # Configure to your liking, reload the config by tying: /lagg reload # #                                -                                   # #        Here is a helpful tutorial on this configuration setup!     # #   http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/clearlagg/pages/config-setup/  # #--------------------------------------------------------------------# #                     All possible mob names                         # # http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/clearlagg/pages/mob-types/nodes/ # #--------------------------------------------------------------------# settings:   auto-update: true   enable-signs: true   config-version: 1   disable-waterlife: true   keep-spawn-in-memory: true   enable-api: true    #What type of entities SHOULD NOT be removed while doing /lagg area? area-filter:     - Itemframe     - Painting     - Wolf     - Villager     - Horse #Should clearlag reset the config (more stable), or attempt to add the new paths into your config? # -- Puting this as false wont reset your config, but may cause bugs.. Still in testing! config-updater:   force-update: false #This limits the mob egg spawners so players cannot "overload" the server with them # -- 'check-radius' stands for the radius clearlag will check for nearby entities # -- 'max-mobs' is how many entities may be in the radius before the spawning is blocked mobegg-limiter:   enabled: false   check-radius: 8   max-mobs: 5 #Disable new chunk generation, or just put a cap on how many can load at once. # -- THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH 1.6.4! chunk-limiter:   enabled: false   limit: 6000   create-new-chunks: true #This modifies not only the view of the mobs, but will also simplify how they spawn # -- Lower it is, the better your entity tick will be # -- If it's too high, expect bugs / lots of lag mob-range:   enabled: false   zombie: 30   skeleton: 30   creeper: 20 #How long should items/Mobs be left on the ground # -- Goes by seconds live-time:   enabled: false   interval: 10   mobtimer: true   itemtimer: true   arrowtimer: true   arrowkilltime: 15   moblivetime: 40   itemlivetime: 40 #Let clearlag control the spawning in ALL worlds? (Supports all plugins!) # -- This will also respect cancelations, unlike minecraft's native code custom-mobspawner:   enabled: false #How many times should clearlag attempt to find a safe location for the mob to spawn   max-tries: 50 #(In seconds) how often should clearlag try to spawn mobs?   interval: 30 #This is the radius around the player   radius: 30 #This is the radius FROM the player (in blocks!)   radius-from: 7 #How far should mobs spawn from eachother (NOT in blocks!!) (1,010 = around 10-20 blocks)   mob-radius: 1010 #Should we keep trying to spawn a mob if a clear location isn't found   forcespawn: false #4 = nighttime, what light level should mobs spawn in   lightlevel: 4 #Chance mobs will have armor/sword, 1 being diamond every time   armor-chance: 30   mobs: #More types of a mob, more likely it'll spawn(ONLY IN NORMAL WORLDS!)     - zombie 5     - skeleton 3     - creeper     - enderman   animals: #More types of a mob, more likely it'll spawn(ONLY IN NORMAL WORLDS!)     - pig 4     - sheep 1     - cow 6     - chicken 2    #This option disallows the placement of too many tnt-minecarts tnt-minecart:   enabled: false   max: 2   radius: 6    #This option reduces global dispenser rate dispenser-reducer:   enabled: false   time: 100    #This option reduces the explosions of mass amounts of tnt, and reduces tnt lag tnt:   tnt-reducer: false    #This option reduces fire spread rate firespread-reducer:   enabled: false   time: 2000    #How many entities should one chunk be allowed to hold? chunk-entity-limiter:   enabled: false   limit: 40    spawn-limiter:   enabled: false   interval: 15   monsters: 300   animals: 300    #Meters your TPS, if it goes to low, run the commands you wrote below! tps-meter:   enabled: false   interval: 15   tps-trigger: 14.0   commands:     - 'lagg killmobs'     - 'lagg clear'    #This is /lagg killmobs, put what you DON'T want removed! kill-mobs:    disable-build-wither: false    mob-filter:         - Villager         - Wolf         - Horse    #This takes care of mob spawners mobspawner:   enabled: false   max-spawn: 4    #No longer bugged! -- Dont use if you have CB++ or Spigot! item-merger:   enabled: false   radius: 6    #Auto-removal options # -- warnings works like this; time = the time warning should be given, msg = warning message at that time # -- NOTE: The below 'remove' section applies to this remover! # -- NOTE: Putting the interval to low will cause issues! auto-removal:   broadcast-message: '&6[扫地娘] &a清理了 +RemoveAmount 个地面垃圾.'   broadcast-warning: true   enable-scheduler: true   autoremoval-interval: 460   warnings:         - time:400 msg:&6[扫地娘] &a大娘将在 &360 秒后&6扫走地面掉落物, 贵重物品请拿在身上!         - time:440 msg:&6[扫地娘] &a大娘将在 &320 秒后&6扫走地面掉落物, 贵重物品请拿在身上!    #What should be removed during an auto-removal remove:   world-filter:     - this_world   broadcast-removal: true   boat: true   falling-block: true   experienceOrb: true   painting: true   projectile: true   item: true   itemframe: false   minecart: true   primed-tnt: true   arrow: true   snowball: true   fireball: true   ender-signal: true   item-filter:   # - 264   # - 265   # - 311   # - 312   # - 266   mobs:   # - cow #What should be removed during /lagg clear command-remove:   world-filter:     - this_world   broadcast-removal: false   boat: true   falling-block: true   experienceOrb: true   painting: true   projectile: true   item: true   itemframe: false   minecart: true   primed-tnt: true   arrow: true   snowball: true   fireball: true   ender-signal: true   item-filter:   # - 264   # - 265   # - 311   # - 312   # - 266   mobs:   # - cow     check:   world-filter:     - this_world   boat: true   falling-block: true   experienceOrb: true   painting: true   projectile: true   item: true   itemframe: false   minecart: true   primed-tnt: true   arrow: true   snowball: true   fireball: true   ender-signal: true   item-filter:   # - 264   # - 265   # - 311   # - 312   # - 266   mobs:     creature: true     animals: true     monster: true     limit:   enable-limit: false   max: 1000   check-interval: 60   broadcast-message: '&6[扫地娘] &a清理了 +RemoveAmount 个地面垃圾.!'   world-filter:     - this_world   broadcast-removal: true   boat: true   falling-block: true   experienceOrb: true   painting: true   projectile: true   item: true   itemframe: false   minecart: true   primed-tnt: true   arrow: true   snowball: true   fireball: true   ender-signal: true   item-filter:   # - 264   # - 265   # - 311   # - 312   # - 266复制代码 Lockette（strings-zn.yml信息汉化）100%（非本人汉化） language: Simplified chinese author: Acru editors: '' version: 0 alternate-private-tag: 私有 alternate-moreusers-tag: 更多人 alternate-everyone-tag: 所有人 alternate-operators-tag: 管理员 alternate-timer-tag: 定时器 alternate-fee-tag: 有偿 msg-user-conflict-door: Conflicting door removed! msg-user-illegal: Illegal chest removed! msg-user-resize-owned: You cannot resize a chest claimed by ***. msg-help-chest: 如要锁箱，请使用木牌右键箱子即可上锁. msg-owner-release: You have released a container! msg-admin-release: 管理员 @@@破坏了 *** 的锁! msg-user-release-owned: You cannot release a container claimed by ***. msg-owner-remove: You have removed users from a container! msg-user-remove-owned: You cannot remove users from a container claimed by ***. msg-user-break-owned: You cannot break a container claimed by ***. msg-user-denied-door: 你没有权限打开这个玩家的门! msg-user-touch-fee: 'A fee of ### will be paid to ***, to open.' msg-user-touch-owned: 这个箱子是属于 *** 的。 msg-help-select: 告示牌已经被选中，输入/lockette 行数 玩家名称来编辑木牌. msg-admin-bypass: 管理员 @@@强行打开了 *** 的门! msg-admin-snoop: 管理员 @@@破坏了 *** 的锁! msg-user-denied: 您没有权限打开这个玩家的箱子! msg-error-zone: This zone is protected by ***. msg-error-permission: Permission to lock container denied. msg-error-claim: No unclaimed container nearby to make Private! msg-error-claim-conflict: Conflict with an existing protected door. msg-admin-claim-error: Player *** is not online, be sure you have the correct name. msg-admin-claim: You have claimed a container for ***. msg-owner-claim: You have claimed a container! msg-error-adduser-owned: You cannot add users to a container claimed by ***. msg-error-adduser: No claimed container nearby to add users to! msg-owner-adduser: You have added users to a container! msg-help-command1: '&C/lockette - Edits signs on locked containers.   Right click on the sign to edit.' msg-help-command2: '&C/lockette fix - Fixes an automatic door that is in the wrong   position. Look at the door to edit.' msg-help-command3: '&C/lockette reload - Reloads the configuration files. Operators   only.' msg-help-command4: '&C/lockette version - Reports Lockette version.' msg-admin-reload: Reloading plugin configuration files. msg-error-fix: No owned door found. msg-error-edit: First select a sign by right clicking it. msg-owner-edit: Sign edited successfully.复制代码 Crazylogin（en_en登陆信息汉化） CRAZYLOGIN=CrazyLogin CRAZYLOGIN.ADMINLOGIN.FAILEDWARN=&C&n警告！发生了一次失败的管理员登陆请求 $0$ @ $1$ CRAZYLOGIN.BROADCAST.JOIN=&E$0$ 进入了服娘的游戏中. CRAZYLOGIN.BROADCAST.KICK=&E$0$ 被请出了游戏. CRAZYLOGIN.BROADCAST.QUIT=&E$0$ 离开了服娘的怀抱. CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.AUTOLOGOUT=当你离开该服务器,你就会被自动登出. CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.COMMANDS.ADDED=该命令已添加到白名单指令列单中\n($0$) CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.COMMANDS.LISTHEAD=$2$白名单指令 (页数 $0$ / $1$) CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.COMMANDS.REMOVED=该命令已经从白名单指令列单中移除\n($0$) #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.CONFIG.RELOADED= #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.DATABASE.RELOADED= CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.DETACHIP.FAIL=无法从这个链接$0$分离 $1$ 这个IP\n(这可能IP没有附属在上面) CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.DETACHIP.SUCCESS=从这个$0$ 的连接中分离了 $1$ 这个IP CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.DROPOLDDATA.DELETED=$0$ 删除了已经有$1$天没上线, $2$个玩家 CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.EXPLOITWARN=&C警告！禁止执行命令 $0$ CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.GENERATEDTOKEN=已经为$0$生成了"标志":\n&3/tokenlogin $1$ #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.CHECKPASSWORD.FAILED= #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.CHECKPASSWORD.SUCCESS= CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.CREATE.SUCCESS=创建该账号 $0$ 成功. #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.DELETE.SUCCESS= #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.EXPIREPASSWORD.SUCCESS= CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.PASSWORD.SUCCESS=为该账号 $0$ 更换密码成功! CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.PLAYER.REVERIFY.SUCCESS=$0$ 再一次的登陆了! CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.REGISTER.WARNCONFIRMPASSWORDDISABLED=&C警告: &E确认密码功能被禁用!\n输入您的密码一次就可以了.\n如果这双重密码不是你想要的,你应该改变它. #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.SAVED= #CRAZYLOGIN.COMMAND.SAVELOGINLOCATION= CRAZYLOGIN.DATABASE.ACCESSWARN=&C警告！数据库无法访问！ CRAZYLOGIN.DATABASE.LOADED=从数据库读取了$0$条目 CRAZYLOGIN.EXCEPTION.ACCOUNTSPERIP.TOMUCH=这个IP注册的帐号过多!\n你只能注册 &C$3$ &F账号.\n&F已经注册的账号: &E$1$ CRAZYLOGIN.EXCEPTION.REGISTER.DISABLED=&C该游戏中注册已关闭. #CRAZYLOGIN.EXCEPTION.REGISTER.PASSWORDREJECTED= #CRAZYLOGIN.EXCEPTION.REGISTER.PASSWORDREJECTED.LENGTH= CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.BANNED.UNTIL=&C你被禁止登录,直到这个期限 $0$. CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.COMMANDUSAGE=你没有登陆来执行这个指令. CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.CONNECTIONS.TOMUCH=太多的连接数! CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.LOGINFAIL=&C登录失败! CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.NAME.INVALIDCASE=&E用户名字大小写不同！ CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.NAME.INVALIDCHARS=&E用户名包含无效字符! CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.NAME.INVALIDLENGTH=&E用户名过短或过长！ CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.NOACCOUNT=你需要一个账户用于登录服务器！ CRAZYLOGIN.KICKED.SESSION.DUPLICATE=&C你已经在线！ &C请等待你的连接超时或者联系OP！ CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.FAILED=&C登录失败！ CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.FAILEDWARN=&C朋友！注意大小写啊！ CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.FAILINFO=&E这里已经有&C$0$ &E失败登录请求! #CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.PASSWORDEXPIRED= #CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.PASSWORDREQUIRECHANGE= #CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.PASSWORDREQUIRECHANGE.LENGTH= CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.REQUEST=&C请使用/login <密码> 登录服务器！ CRAZYLOGIN.LOGIN.SUCCESS=&A登录成功！ CRAZYLOGIN.LOGOUT.SUCCESS=&A注销成功！ CRAZYLOGIN.MODE.CHANGE=模式 "$0[        DISCUZ_CODE_6        ]quot;="$1[        DISCUZ_CODE_6        ]quot; 已设 CRAZYLOGIN.PASSWORDCHANGE.SUCCESS=密码已更换！ CRAZYLOGIN.PASSWORDDELETE.SUCCESS=密码已删除！ CRAZYLOGIN.PLAYERINFO.ASSOCIATES=&E账号联系: &5$0$ CRAZYLOGIN.PLAYERINFO.IPADDRESS=&E登录IP: &5$0$ CRAZYLOGIN.PLAYERINFO.LASTACTION=&E最后在线时间: &5$0$ #CRAZYLOGIN.PLAYERINFO.PASSWORDEXPIRED= #CRAZYLOGIN.PLUGININFO.DATABASEENTRIES= CRAZYLOGIN.REGISTER.HEADER=出于安全考虑！请设置一个密码！\n使用 &3/register <密码> &F来创建或更改！ CRAZYLOGIN.REGISTER.HEADER2=如果你想设置一个密码, \n使用 &3/register <密码> &F来创建或更改！ CRAZYLOGIN.REGISTER.REQUEST=&E请使用 &3/register <密码> &F来进行注册 CRAZYLOGIN.SESSION.DUPLICATEWARN=&E$1$ 试图使用$0$名称连接服务器, 但该玩家已经在线! CRAZYLOGIN.TOKENLOGIN.FAILEDWARN=警告! 失败的标志登陆请求! $0$ @ $1$复制代码 Authme（登陆插件汉化信息）非本人汉化 unknown_user: '&a用户名不允许！'复制代码 Intensify[你们想要的config][我把绿宝石换成了海绵<<强化海绵[可以自己修改数据][最近被禁言，见谅] #################################可用附魔ID################################ #保护(0)、火焰保护(1)、掉落保护(2)、爆炸保护(3)、弹射物保护(4)            # #水下呼吸(5)、水下挖掘(6)、荆棘(7)、锋利(16)、亡灵杀手(17)                # #节肢杀手(18)、击退(19)、火焰附加(20)、抢夺(21)、效率(32)                 # #精准采集(33)、耐久(34)、时运(35)、力量(48)、冲击(49)、火矢(50)           # #无限(51)                                                                 # ########################################################################### #################################可用怪物ID################################ #(50)爬行者 (51)骷髅 (52)蜘蛛 (53)巨人 (54)僵尸 (55)史莱姆                # #(56)恶魂 (57)僵尸猪人 (58)末影人 (59)洞穴蜘蛛 (60)蠹虫                   # #(61)烈焰人 (62)岩浆怪 (63)末影龙 (64)凋灵 (66)女巫                       # #################################可用怪物ID################################ ############### #####权 限##### ############### Admin: "per.qh.admin" ############### #####配 置##### ############### id:   items: #格式: <物品ID>: <附魔ID> #例子 276: 16 #强化276的物品 附魔效果为16(ID观看配置文件顶部)     276: 16     311: 0 chance: #强化几率设置   default: 100,90,80,70,60,50,40,30,20,10,5 #0-10默认强化几率   normal: 0 #普通强化石加成最大100   luck: 5 #幸运强化石加成最大100   safe: 5 #安全强化石加成最大100   vip: 100 #vip强化石加成最大100 drop: #掉落设置   block: false #打破方块掉落是否启用   blocks: #方块掉落配置     - "1 normal 10" #格式: <方块ID> <类型> <几率 > ID请看最上面 #例子: - "1 normal 10" #为打破ID为1的方块,有10%的几率掉落普通强化石 #类型: normal luck safe vip (大小写不敏感)   mob: true #怪物掉落启用   mobs: #怪物掉落配置     - "54 normal 100" #格式: <怪物ID> <类型> <几率 > ID请看最上面 #例子: - "54 normal 10" #干掉ID为54的怪物,有10%的几率掉落普通强化石 #类型: normal luck safe vip (大小写不敏感) style: #强化风格设置   color: "&b&l" #颜色   a: "●" #有等级   b: "○" #无等级 ############### #####语 言##### ############### lang_1: "&c此命令只能由玩家发出" lang_2: "&b<&6/qh 命令提示&b>" lang_3: "&b-->&6/qh get <类型> <数量> &7- &a&l获得一个强化石" lang_4: "&a【类型: normal 普通海绵、luck 防爆海绵、safe 高级海绵、vip 超级海绵、admin 管理员海绵】" lang_5: "&b-->&6/qh reload &7- &a&l重载插件" lang_6: "&a已发送到背包" lang_7: "&a重载成功"
